name: A Trolley Load of Problems
description:
The classic trolley problem is in digital form. Step up right now to prove your morality.

Try to get all the endings; there's about 5 if I remember correctly.

This game was made for the geojam, with the theme of switch. I've used that theme in my game as the in-game switch that you pull to control the trolley.

(You can also play on a browser on your phone if you want, which is pretty epic)
